channel.description: Recent content in statictestfactory on Codifice

item.title: Using MbUnit StaticTestFactory to Validate Sitemap.xml Links
item.description: I’ve been investigating a replacement for our current link checker (SEO Optimization Toolkit) to be run automatically as part of our build so that we can get a quick heads up if one of our dynamic pages breaks.  The problem is that as most of our sites are built with Ektron there’s a lot of potential for a combination of content and code to break individual pages that share a template with working pages.
